text: Love Nest is a 1951 American comedy movie directed by Joseph M. Newman and based on the 1950 novel The Reluctant Landlord by Scott Corbett. It stars June Haver, William Lundigan, Frank Fay, Marilyn Monroe and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joseph M. Newman
title: Love Nest
